name: Gewgawlicious
description:
An important doctor has left to get milk. He entrusts you with his gewgaw machine. You shouldn't create gewgaws. You do it anyway.

Everything is done with the mouse. Esc quits. Windows version is fullscreen.

Created for the Glorious Trainwrecks Secret Santa 2016 Game Jam, for mkapolk, who requested " little playground full of gewgaws that you can doink around and they'll buzz and sputz and interact with each other."

Play more of my games here, thanks!
